plot: In Maine, Duffy prepares for the arrival of Lulu and Fred, two New Yorkers she's never met but impulsively invited for a weekend visit. All three find love and friendship.
title: (I'm Living) A Charmed Life
plot_es: In Maine, Duffy prepares for the arrival of Lulu and Fred, two New Yorkers she's never met but impulsively invited for a weekend visit. All three find love and friendship.
plot_en: In Maine, Duffy prepares for the arrival of Lulu and Fred, two New Yorkers she's never met but impulsively invited for a weekend visit. All three find love and friendship.
